creator: pooja.dhannawat535@gmail.com
dominik.stadler@gmx.at
text: PdfConverter is not part of Apache POI. This is likely another case of confusion from xdocreport incorrectly using org.apache.poi namespace, you need to first talk to the developer of xdocreport...

creator: dominik.stadler@gmx.at
text: BTW, xdocreport fixed the package naming in v2.0 via https://github.com/opensagres/xdocreport/issues/174
